thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Hollie

author: Hollie
title: Hollie
text:
Had the BEST experience I've EVER had purchasing my beautiful new car from Springwood Mitsubishi!
Staff (Dale!) were extremely knowledgeable about their product, took their time ensuring all our questions were answered and making sure we loved our choice (how could we not?!)
All staff involved were friendly, genuine, non-pushy (product speaks for itself) and the price was unbeatable.
Would ABSOLUTELY recommend the staff here if looking for your next car!!!
